arts.sum: In fact, both matches between the pair were decided in injury time last season, as Pedro Neto struck late to win it at Craven Cottage. Chelsea's last defeat at home did, in fact, come at the hands of Fulham on Boxing Day, where Rodrigo Muniz won it in injury time.
